name: aono
description: asynchronous logger for node with back-pressure capability

scripts.test: TS_NODE_FILES=1 mocha --use_strict -r source-map-support/register -r coffeescript/register -r ts-node/register src/mocha.config.coffee $(find src -name "*.spec.coffee")
scripts.copy: mkdir -p lib/ && cp package.json lib/ && cp README.md lib/ && cp LICENSE lib/
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run copy && npm run test
scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm install && npm run clean-build && npm publish lib
